sentences.english: The party tonight was crowded with wits and beauties.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的舞會才子佳人雲集。

sentences.english: The love-drama about talented scholars and beautiful girls is main form of the Yuan opera.
sentences.chinese: 才子佳人愛情戲是元雜劇愛情戲的主要形式。

sentences.english: These books are all about talented scholars and lovely ladies.
sentences.chinese: 這些書都是寫才子佳人的。

sentences.english: Wuhan"is delighted for frain", the Shui Shang wedding, attract to come to genius and beauty absolutely myriad.
sentences.chinese: 武漢“喜谷”，水上婚禮，吸引來才子佳人萬萬千。

sentences.english: Natural beauties collocation, only envy mandarin duck not envy immortal.
sentences.chinese: 天生才子佳人搭配，只羨鴛鴦不羨神仙。

sentences.english: All the wits and beauties of the town were present at the party.
sentences.chinese: 全城所有的才子佳人都出席了這次宴會。
